full_text:
Re: CORRECTED: Subpoena and Request for Emails ((Out of Office))
From
To
Date 2019/07/12 07:27
Subject: Re: CORRECTED: Subpoena and Request for Emails ((Out of Office))

I will be out of the office on Friday, July 12. If you need immediate assistance, please contact Supervisory Attorney [redacted] Legal Assistant [redacted] or call the institution at 646-836-6300 and ask for the Operations Lieutenant or the Institution Duty Officer. Thank you.
>>> [redacted] 07/12/19 07:27 >>>

Good morning [redacted]

Can you please expedite the below request for emails and the attached subpoena for calls, excluding any emails/calls to the addresses/numbers listed? I understand he may not have any since he housed in SHU currently.

Thank you,
[redacted]
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-6455
f: (646)836-7665

>>> [redacted] (USANYS) 7/11/2019 9:53 PM >>>

Apologies, my prior email was missing some of the contact information for Epstein's attorneys. Please disregard the prior subpoena and request.

Attached please find a revised subpoena with a corrected list of attorney phone numbers to exclude.

In addition, please accept our written request for the e-mail correspondence of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (76318-054) from July 6, 2019 through July 11, 2019 - excluding any correspondence between Epstein [redacted]
[redacted]

Best,
[redacted]

Page 6331
DOJ-OGR-00024284

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons. The content appears to be related to a legal or law enforcement matter involving Jeffrey Epstein.
